title: Resetting
description:
Monica Day, Tracey Segarra and Amanda Wood share stories about an open relationship, a mother's feelings about abortion, and a sister's memory.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (John Scofield, Monica Day, Adrianne Lenker, Amanda Wood, Amber Run, Tracey Segarra, kevin Allison, Robert Fullum)
